original_text: Moses told the Lord's message to the Israelites. But they refused to listen to him. They were very weak and tired, because their Egyptian masters were so cruel to them.
korean_text: 모세가 이와 같이 이스라엘 자손에게 전하나 그들이 마음의 상함과 가혹한 노역으로 말미암아 모세의 말을 듣지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: But they refused to listen to him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 그의 말을 듣기를 거부했습니다

sentences.original_text: They were very weak and tired
